original_title: Night Ranger - 35 Years and a Night in Chicago
overview: In celebration of their 35+ year career, this new live album, featuring all their classic and most recent hits, sees the band at the top of their game, delivering a superb performance not to be missed! Recorded May 7, 2016 concert at the the House Of Blues in Chicago, Illinois.
title: Night Ranger - 35 Years and a Night in Chicago
